name: Pablo Museum
description:
Trouble in the Pablo museum

Did you ever want to steal objects or pictures with a friend?
Did another friend try to stop you?
Good! Trouble in the Pablo Museum is THE game you have to try!
Play as teams of 2 and steal as many objects as you can before the end of the timer!
But don't forget the Policeman and the ghost who will give it their best to stop your burglary..
